name: Environmental factors
description: Sub-types the environment into factors that make up the physical, social and attitudinal environment in which people live and conduct their lives.

name: Life event
description: An instance of an event which occurs to or with a person during their life.

name: Location
description: The act or process of locating or the state of being located.

name: Model of care
description: The overarching design of how care is delivered to a person.

name: Organisation
description: A business or administrative concern created for particular ends.

name: Party
description: Those persons, party groups or organisations who are part of the health and welfare systems including those who are known to the system and those who are of interest to it. For example, a party as a recipient of services, provider of services, purchaser of services or funder of services.

name: Person/group of persons
description: Sub-types people and groups according to whether they involve one or more people.

name: Service episode
description: A period of time during which a person receives assistance from a service provider.

name: Service/care event
description: Something that happens to or with a party.

name: Service/care provider
description: An instance of a role that a party, as a service or care provider, plays in an event.
